title: Noam Chomsky:  9/11 conspiracy theories, War on Terror,  at the University of Sussex  #interview

In the 2007 interview with students at the University of Sussex, Noam Chomsky addressed a wide range of topics, including 9/11 conspiracy theories, the War on Terror, George W. Bush and Tony Blair's policies, Iran, Iraq, Israel, and Palestine. He also discussed climate change, Kyoto Protocol, West Bank settlements, and global political dynamics. Chomsky provided his critical insights on these issues, encouraging students to think deeply about the complexities of global politics and the role of power in shaping world events.
